ing: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as needed
5 fluid ounces amaretto liqueur (such as DisaronnoÂ®)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage
des: "it is sort of like a Long Island ice tea but a different taste. Be careful though, you may not realize how much alcohol you are are consuming!"
ins: Fill a large glass with ice; add amaretto liqueur, triple sec, rum, and cola. Stir.
